description.summary: This cluster encompasses seasoned professionals who lead creative initiatives within marketing departments or agencies. They are responsible for overseeing branding, design, and content strategy to ensure cohesive and impactful marketing campaigns.
description.typicalBackground: Typically have extensive experience in creative agencies or in-house marketing departments, holding senior roles such as Creative Director, Group Creative Director, or Senior Creative Director. They often possess a blend of design, strategic planning, and leadership skills.

matchReasons: Title: Brand Marketing Specialist aligns with creative marketing leadership
Skills in Branding, Content Strategy, and Project Management
Title: Experiential Marketing Producer involves creative branding and event-driven marketing
Skills in Event Management and Public Relations

description.summary: Professionals in this cluster specialize in organizing, coordinating, and executing events of various scales. They manage the logistical aspects of event production, ensuring seamless execution and memorable experiences for attendees.
commonCharacteristics: Expertise in event planning and coordination
Experience with stage and production management
description.typicalBackground: Often have experience working with event management firms, production companies, or within the events departments of large organizations. Roles typically include Event Producer, Production Coordinator, Stage Manager, and similar titles.

matchReasons: Title: Director of Public Relations, Internal Communications and Investor Relations involves event coordination
Experience with content strategy and organizational leadership
Titles: Senior Vice President, Brand Experience and managing experiential marketing projects
Skills in Event Management and Brand Activation

description.summary: Individuals in this group hold senior roles in marketing and communications, driving strategic initiatives that enhance brand presence and engage target audiences. They oversee marketing campaigns, manage communications teams, and align marketing strategies with business objectives.
commonCharacteristics: Leadership of marketing and communications teams
Focus on brand development and market positioning
description.typicalBackground: These professionals typically have a robust background in marketing or communications, often working their way up through various managerial roles to executive positions such as Marketing Director, VP of Marketing, or Communications Manager.

matchReasons: Title: Senior Project Manager, Digital Marketing signifies executive-level responsibility
Skills in Strategy, Salesforce, and Marketing Operations
Title: Marketing Communications Manager and Regional Marketing Manager indicate executive roles
Skills in Marketing Strategy, Communications, and Campaign Management

description.summary: This cluster includes professionals who specialize in managing an organization's public image and media interactions. They develop and execute public relations strategies, handle media inquiries, and cultivate relationships with journalists and media outlets to secure positive coverage.
commonCharacteristics: Expertise in media relations and public relations
description.typicalBackground: These individuals often have experience working in PR agencies or in-house communications departments. Common roles include PR Manager, Communications Director, Media Relations Specialist, and similar titles.

matchReasons: Title: AVP Marketing Engagement and Communications involves media relations
Skills in Media Relations, Public Relations, and Strategic Communications
Title: Vice President relates to high-level PR and media strategy
Skills in Media Relations, Public Relations, and Marketing Strategy
